name: Cult Nightmare
description:
*This Game Contains Jumpscare*

Cult nightmare

Once upon a time, there was a girl called "Nina". One day, she goes to a scout camp. She felt bored so much, so she's going around the forest. In the forest, she got kidnapped by a "reaper". The reaper is a member of a demon cult that needs a victim for its cult ritual. Nina was the victim, she got trapped in a strange house and she only has 7 days to escape before the day of the ritual start.

How the game fit the theme "Failure is Progress"
By Failing to escape, you will get a weird dream that can help you to figure out how to escape.

Clue: Every time you get caught you will see a dream about the reaper when he stopped moving he actually hiding something in there and you must go there to find out what he actually hiding.
